name: excalidraw-mcp
description: Excalidraw diagram MCP server with headless PNG rendering for Claude Code CLI

scripts.build: tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && bun build server.ts renderer.ts --outdir dist --target node --external agent-browser --external "agent-browser/dist/browser.js" --external playwright-core && bun build main.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --external "./server.js" --external "./renderer.js" --external agent-browser --external "agent-browser/dist/browser.js" --external playwright-core --banner "#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run serve
